title: JSON schema for Web Application manifest files (schema extensions)

mjs_access_whitelist.description: The mjs_access_whitelist member is an array of rules that indicates the type of access the URLs matching the rule should have.

url.description: A string that represents the URL pattern for which the rule should be applied to.

apiAccess.description: A string that defines the type of access to the runtime API where the application is running.
